text: aqsm allah taealaa balryah almthyrat lltrab, falshb alhamlat thqla ezymana min alma', falsfn alty tajri fi albahhar jryana dha yasr wshwlt, falmlaykt alty tuqassim 'amr allah fi khlqh. 'iina aladhi tueadun bh- 'ayuha alnas- min albaeth walhisab lkayn haqa yqyn, wa'iin alhisab walthwab ealaa al'aemal lkayn la mhalt
